html:
10.28.20  1:46 am   do you think there are any songs that simply can't be rendered to work without percussion, eg just keys & vocals alone?

     no, but, keep in mind you will need to be well open to playing notes that may be very different from what occured on the recording. in other words, of course you can do it, but you can't be afraid to approach it entirely differently

     if a song seems off without it what can be done that will probably make it nice, if any generalizations can be made here? like bringing it to the point where the song feels like it has bones and isn't a weird pile of flesh, if that makes sense.

     it involves mostly the same creativity that is involved in songwriting. somehow you have to make something up

     like how can one troubleshoot this kind of thing if you literally could not give it a beat due to being trapped in a void dimension where all you have is a piano and your floating disembodied head and hands. asking for a friend who lives in the void

     maybe all it takes is to be trapped on an island with only the piano and your voice. it's amazing how quick you can come up with good solutions, when you have fewer tools. basically i can promise you 2 things: 1, it can be done, but 2, you may have to re-invent the whole thing, which is really why it's gonna be so much fun

10.28.20  1:30 am   What is your favorite video game? 

      making videos

      change it more. it's still not right

     yes

      or are you game for a good ol' collabo?

     that usually goes horribly wrong, but, there's always next time i suppose

      Asking for a friend, well, actually the friend is me, a music teacher & person.

      average

      i have learned to live with them

      attempted to add non-songs into the 2 week song schedule without reducing the song schedule, and in the process failed at adding the non-song and failed at not ruining the 2 week song schedule

      make the whole damn thing up!

      just keep trying to find more and more ones you like, and eventually you will figure it out

      #putitbackin

10.27.20  9:54 am   tell me a sad story

      yes

10.27.20  8:08 am   where can you find a pony

      look in the mirror

10.27.20  7:47 am   while you make songs are u ever just like

      yes

10.27.20  7:24 am   What inspired you to create the music you have made, such a unique sound. 

     hearing it 10,000 times better in my head, and 10,000 times more of it, then after freaking out more than i ever thought possible, sometimes i am able to turn it all around and execute at least SOMETHING, thank heavens

10.27.20  4:54 am   It's my birthday, do you like holidays sometimes?

     yes but not because they are holidays. because they are days. actually, thinking about the 'holiday' aspect instantly makes me sad because it would imply that there should be at least 364 days that are less good. which is way too many not good days for my preference. i believe that at least 51% of days should be good, and i think this is reasonable to achieve

      When do you not like holidays?

     any time i am aware that it is a holiday

10.27.20  4:23 am   Are you currently making a new video?

      yes

10.27.20  3:54 am   Hey homie, how many years did it take you to master the ability to make such quality content

      i didn't master it, that's why barely any of the best stuff exists yet

10.27.20  3:30 am   Are you good at doing metaphors or interpretation of stuff? Personally, I'm garbage at it. 

      i am good at it, until i realize 'good' is a metaphor for 'bad'

10.27.20  2:58 am   What brings you the most joy?

      those moments when i think it might be possible to find a way to actually tame my exploding brain just enough to prevent it from destroying my entire life

10.27.20  2:39 am   I feel like if you had nothing but a guitar, you would make country music

      ah, but here's the question: does it still count as country music if the vocal doesn't have a southern usa dialect

10.27.20  1:18 am   think about it like this: da vinci didn't even get to make 1 video

      that reminds me about how a lot of video makers never get to make 1 painting

      it's basically the equivalent of 1 brush stroke, in a painting

10.26.20  8:02 pm   thoughts on libraries?

      very good architecture. their purpose seems to make the architecture seem even more holy, regardless of how great it may have been otherwise. in other words, put a library in a box, and it will seem like an amazingly beautifully designed box, even from an architectural standpoint
